titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Yale Drama Alumni Association Records
titlestmt.author: compiled by Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Thursday January 10, 2019 at 11:28

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of correspondence, minutes, reports and manuals documenting the operations and activities of the Yale Drama Alumni Association.

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 22-G (YRG 22-G), Records of the Yale School of Drama student, alumni, and support organizations.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the materials is restricted. See Collection Contents for details.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Yale Drama Alumni Association Records (RU 80). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of correspondence, minutes, reports and manuals documenting the operations and activities of the Yale Drama Alumni Association.

controlaccess.subject: Universities and colleges -- Alumni and alumnae
